metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36385 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.10.drivers/infiniband/core/ucma.c has a use-after-free because the ctx isreached via the ctx_list in some ucma_migrate_id situations whereucma_close is called, aka CID-f5449e74802c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36385` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-90-generic - 5.4.0-90.101
linux-image-5.4.0-90-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-90.101
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-90-generic - 5.4.0-90.101
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-90-lowlatency - 5.4.0-90.101
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1049-kvm - 5.4.0-1049.51
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-90.101').
